name: Posthuman
description:
Out of all the places in the galaxy, Evelyn never thought she would return to her home planet. Voth was a miserable place for a colony: perpetually blanketed in fog with a shoreline that never saw the sun. As a bounty hunter, she had other jobs on her plate. But this one came from an old friend-- a father with a missing child. Echoes of the past swirled in her head and she recalled of disappearances in the tight-knit colony. Determined, Eveyln approaches Voth looking for answers-- but sometimes truth is better left unknown.

Credits:
